attributes.action: Defer Ulez within the A406 & South circular roads because of Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: The Ulez scheme is unattainable at this time due the wrenching effect the corona virus is having on people's income
attributes.background: To defer the role out of this scheme because of lack of funds to start acquiring new vehicles for many at this challenging times

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the Mayor of London.

You can petition directly to the Mayor of London, the London Assembly and/or Transport for London (TfL) here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
